ComicInfo.Title: Creating the Inner Tube; Snowstorm; Cracked Interviews the Music King; A Day in the Senate; If Archie Bunker Took Over the Leads in Other TV Series; Cracked Goes to Las Vegas; How to Translate Travel Ads; Vampires of the World; Cracked's Guide to Backpacking; A Day at the Zoo; Kansas City Bummer
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.The first inner tube is created - but being made of stone, it doesn't work very well.
Hudd and Dini flee into a snowstorm but a St. Bernard rescue dog turns out to be the guard.
The steel ball around a convict's leg eats the convict's lunch.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:36:26. [Issue ID 250469]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charlie Rodrigues,Lo Linkert,John Severin,Vic Martin,John Langton,Oskar Blotta Jr.,Dick Wright,Don Orehek,Bob Taylor,Bernard Baily
ComicInfo.Inker: Charlie Rodrigues,Lo Linkert,John Severin,Vic Martin,John Langton,Oskar Blotta Jr.,Dick Wright,Don Orehek,Bob Taylor,Bernard Baily
